title: Generative AI as a Safety Net for Survey Question Refinement
summary: This paper explores the use of generative AI to assist in drafting and refining survey questions, addressing the challenges of creating clear and accurate questions for diverse respondents. It highlights the demanding nature of writing effective survey questions and how AI can help mitigate errors.
